H0.text: What is the traditional/modern language of Iran and old Persia, named from the latter. Persianic

H1.text: What is the traditional/modern language of Iran and old Persia, named from the latter. Parsian

H2.text: What is the traditional/modern language of Iran and old Persia, named from the latter. Irani

H3.text: What is the traditional/modern language of Iran and old Persia, named from the latter. Farci

A4.text: Persian is also known by its endonym Farsi or Parsi
